TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IPersonalizable

summary.span: 定義應用和擷取個人化狀態的其他管理能力。

span.span: Defines additional management capabilities for the application and extraction of personalization state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了使用`Personalizable`屬性上的控制項屬性，控制項也可以實作額外的管理功能的應用程式和個人化狀態的擷取。In addition to using the `Personalizable` attribute on control properties, a control can also implement for additional management capabilities for the application and extraction of personalization state. 例如，需要管理私用狀態資訊的控制項應該實作這個介面。For example, controls that need to manage private state information should implement this interface. 透過複雜的機制，例如自訂快取的解決方案、 大型主機，或 XML Web 服務的資料持續性存取個人化的資料的控制項也應該實作這個介面。Controls that access personalized data through complex mechanisms, such as custom cache solutions, data persistence to mainframes, or XML Web services, should also implement this interface. > [!IMPORTANT] > 您不應該將 App_Code 目錄中定義的類別為基礎的類型，並再依存於預設的二進位序列化機制。You should not add types based on classes defined in the App_Code directory and then depend on the default binary serialization mechanism. 因為，且可各自擁有其時間變更隨機時間點的組件名稱不一致的二進位序列化 App_Code 為基礎的成品。App_Code-based artifacts are not consistently binary-serializable due to the fact that they can have their assembly names changed at random points in time. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用介面。The following code example demonstrates how to use the interface. 此範例包含參考名為 Web 組件控制項的.aspx 網頁`UrlListWebPart`。The example consists of an .aspx page that references a Web Part control named `UrlListWebPart`. 下列程式碼是此範例的.aspx 檔案。The following code is the .aspx file for the example. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/CS/IPersonalizableCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/VB/IPersonalizableVB.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼是自訂的來源控制項。The following code is the source for the custom control. 這個檔案應該置於 App_Code 目錄中。This file should be placed in the App_Code directory. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/CS/urllistwebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/VB/urllistwebpart.vb#2)] 載入瀏覽器中。Load the page in a browser. 輸入的名稱表示 URL，然後將實際 URL 開頭`http://`，按一下**新增**按鈕即可加入 URL。Type in a name to represent a URL, then add an actual URL beginning with `http://`, and click the **Add** button to add the URL.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsDirty As Boolean
public: property bool IsDirty { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，表示控制項管理的自訂資料是否已變更。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the custom data that a control manages has changed.

value.span: 如果由 介面管理的自訂資料已變更，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the custom data managed with the interface has changed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 受控制的資料已變更，當控制項被視為 「 有所變更 」。When data managed by a control has changed, the control is considered "dirty." 控制項應傳回`true`如果自訂資料，就會管理透過介面已經變更。A control should return `true` if the custom data that it manages through the interface has changed. 當控制項傳回`true`從這個屬性，此控制項的屬性值擷取期間會呼叫介面方法實作。If a control returns `true` from this property, the control's interface method implementation is called during property value extraction. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性會自動檢查個人化基礎結構處理 POST 要求的第二個階段。This property is checked automatically by the personalization infrastructure during the latter phases of processing a POST request. 不過，GET 要求傳回的值從不會檢查屬性。However, for GET requests, the value returned from the property is not checked. 其他事件必須使控制項才會被視為 「 有所變更 」 的任何控制項的狀態--不只是資料管理的-儲存。Some other event has to have caused the control to be considered "dirty" for any control state--not just data managed by --to be saved. 如果控制項可以將本身為 「 中途 」 GET 要求期間或在某些特定界限的情況下的個人化基礎結構會考慮控制項 「 有所變更 」 期間 GET 要求，然後如果一律進行呼叫。If a control can mark itself as "dirty" during a GET request, or if the personalization infrastructure under some very specific boundary conditions considers a control "dirty" during a GET request, then will always be called. 控制項可以參考其相關聯控制，並檢查屬性來判斷目前的範圍。A control can reference its associated control and check the property to determine the current scope. 控制項的自訂資料的 「 有所變更 」 狀態應該要適用於目前的範圍。The "dirty" state of a control's custom data should be appropriate for the current scope. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates use of the property. 此範例的第一個部分是主控網頁控制項。The first part of the example is the Web page that hosts a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/CS/IPersonalizableCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/VB/IPersonalizableVB.aspx#1)] 此範例的第二個部分是自訂的程式碼控制項稱為`UrlListWebPart`。The second part of the example is the code for the custom control called `UrlListWebPart`. 這個檔案應該置於 App_Code 目錄来執行此範例。This file should be placed in the App_Code directory to run the example. 請注意，原始碼實作屬性。Note that the source code implements the property. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/CS/urllistwebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/VB/urllistwebpart.vb#2)] 載入瀏覽器中。Load the page in a browser. 輸入的名稱表示 URL，然後將實際 URL 開頭`http://`，按一下**新增**按鈕即可加入 URL。Type in a name to represent a URL, then add an actual URL beginning with `http://`, and click the **Add** button to add the URL.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Load(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary state) cil managed

param.name: state
param.span: ，包含從基礎資料存放區載入的自訂範圍資料。

span.span: A that contains custom scoped data that was loaded from the underlying data store.

summary.span: 將自訂資料載入至控制項。

span.span: Loads custom data into a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 允許以將其載入自訂資料本身的控制項上呼叫此方法。This method is called on a control to allow it to load custom data into itself. 它也可以傳回值，指出是否將控制項的自訂狀態必須重新寫入至基礎資料存放區，不論是否變更過的頁面上的其他個人化資料。It can also return a value that indicates whether a control's custom state must be written back to the underlying data store, regardless of whether any other personalization data on the page has changed. 控制項可以設定自己的自訂屬性，以及執行其他內部邏輯，根據個人化字典中所包含的值。A control can set its own custom properties and carry out additional internal logic based on the values contained in the personalization dictionary. 這個方法會呼叫設定套用至控制項的個人化資料時的 Web 組件控制項。This method is called by the Web Parts control set while applying personalization data to a control. 您也應該知道的合併行為-範圍與-範圍中所包含的屬性物件。You should also be aware of the merge behavior of -scoped versus -scoped properties contained in the object. `state`參數包含合併從基礎資料存放區載入的自訂資料表示法。The `state` parameter contains a merged representation of custom data that was loaded from the underlying data store. 在的範圍，請頁面本身已中時，先前加入的所有值都範圍，就可以使用。In scope, all the values that were previously added when the page itself was in scope would be available. 中的範圍，請與關聯的值如果個人化範圍已加入網頁中時的一個值範圍，以及不同的值中的頁面時範圍，則會在個人化基礎結構只包含-範圍值 (與範圍值) 內`state`參數。In scope, if a value associated with personalization scope had one value added when the page was in scope, and a different value when the page was in scope, then the personalization infrastructure would only include the -scoped value (as opposed to the scope value) within the `state` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作中自訂方法控制項。The following code example demonstrates an implementation of the method in a custom control. 若要執行此範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節類別概觀。For the full code required to run this example, see the Example section in the class overview. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/CS/urllistwebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/VB/urllistwebpart.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Save(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary state) cil managed

param.name: state
param.span: ，包含從基礎資料存放區載入的自訂範圍資料。

span.span: A that contains custom scoped data that was loaded from the underlying data store.

summary.span: 將自訂屬性和內部狀態資料儲存在控制項的 物件中。

span.span: Saves custom properties and internal state information in the control's object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 伺服器控制項可以儲存它自己的自訂屬性以及內部狀態資訊中所指定`state`參數。A server control can store its own custom properties and internal state information the specified in the `state` parameter. 資訊會儲存為一系列的名稱/值組。The information is stored as a series of name/value pairs. 使用期間透過控制項所進行的後續呼叫，它可辨識的名稱/值組的控制項負責方法。It is the responsibility of the control to use name/value pairs that it can recognize during subsequent calls made to the control through the method. 控制項可以參考其相關聯控制，並檢查物件來判斷目前的範圍。A control can reference its associated control and check the object to determine the current scope. 自訂狀態資訊應該要適用於目前的範圍。Custom state information should be appropriate for the current scope. 請注意，每個值加入至物件應該是適當的範圍內的值，與相關聯，因為個人化基礎結構在合併時，要取決於這和-範圍自訂資料之前將其傳遞至方法。Note that each value that is added to the object should be associated with the appropriate scope value, because the personalization infrastructure depends on this when merging and -scoped custom data prior to passing it to the method. 當使用標準 ASP.NET 實作的 Web 組件，控制項必須確保狀態字典中的物件可以由 ASP.NET類別。When using the standard ASP.NET implementation of Web Parts, controls must ensure that objects placed in the state dictionary can be serialized by the ASP.NET class. 在實務上，這表示下列各項：In practice, this means the following: - 基本的.NET Framework 類型、 字串和集合導向.NET Framework 類型，例如陣列、 陣列清單、 雜湊表和 hybrid 字典時，會自動序列化。Primitive .NET Framework types, strings, and collection-oriented .NET Framework types such as arrays, array lists, hash tables, and hybrid dictionaries, are automatically serializable. - 提供自己的自訂型別能夠以序列化和還原序列化字串類別會視為可序列化。Custom types that supply their own classes capable of serializing to and deserializing from strings are considered serializable. - 可序列化的自訂型別類別會被視為可序列化。Custom types that can be serialized by the class are considered serializable. > [!IMPORTANT] > 您不應該將 App_Code 目錄中定義的類別為基礎的類型，並再依存於預設的二進位序列化機制。You should not add types based on classes defined in the App_Code directory and then depend on the default binary serialization mechanism. 因為，且可各自擁有其時間變更隨機時間點的組件名稱不一致的二進位序列化 App_Code 為基礎的成品。App_Code-based artifacts are not consistently binary-serializable due to the fact that they can have their assembly names changed at random points in time. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作中自訂方法控制項。The following code example demonstrates implementing the method in a custom control. 若要執行此範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節類別概觀。For the full code required to run this example, see the Example section in the class overview. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/CS/urllistwebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/VB/urllistwebpart.vb#2)]
